summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 2574, for the improvement of 23rd Avenue North from East Madison Street to East Mercer Street, all in the City of Seattle, by installing a water main and fire hydrants, under Ordinance No. 30004 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
